markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fountain of Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=2844) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shisk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=382" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per round

</column>

---

You constantly remember details about the world. You attempt a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26). If you succeed, you gain additional information or context. If you critically succeed, at the GM's discretion you might gain even more additional information or context than normal.
name: Fountain of Secrets
